fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Each day, choose someone to befuddle.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- They will be roleblocked past immunities unless they can decipher strange and peculiar Mafia Universe slang such as rwstfo and frozen and this video https://youtu.be/woKJ6pOzVsc.
- You will have an X% chance to scumread your target at the end of the day, where X is the number of messages they sent that day, learning whether or not they're Town.
- Scumreading is only correct 82% of the time. The other 18% of the time, you unknowingly receive the opposite result.
